text: @SecPompeo Pompeo needs to hand over all the evidence to Congress regarding his allegations that the Coronavirus came from a lab in China. If he doesn’t have  evidence, then he needs to step down. All Trump’s men have no moral compass. An oath means nothing to them. https://t.co/niifzuLwBp
